name: The Expedition (Summy99)
description:
CONTROLS: 
Left mouse to interact and pick up objects.

Left click an inventory item to equip it and right click to de-quip it.

Right click some inventory items to inspect them and interact further.

BACKSTORY:

There isn't much. You awake with no memories in a wooden cabin with a blizzard howling outside. Uncover what has happened and try to escape.

Credits:

Sumner, Yary, and Sean

SFX:

blizzard - https://freesound.org/people/stormpetrel/sounds/173096/

fire - https://freesound.org/people/leosalom/sounds/234288/

door - https://freesound.org/people/DWOBoyle/sounds/151576/

item - https://freesound.org/people/SilverIllusionist/sounds/411178/

door unlock - https://freesound.org/people/angelkunev/sounds/519065/

wood snap - https://freesound.org/people/InspectorJ/sounds/352179/

horror violin - https://freesound.org/people/InspectorJ/sounds/370936/
